title: I DONT UNDERSTAND HOW TO ACTUALLY THE LEAGUE OF LEGENDS MATCHES
body: I am on the IEM website or KAtowica(SP*) & I cant fig out how to watch the kn stream for League{{summoner:3}}

replies.body: I didn't notice it said FRIDAY....my bad guys. That's what was messing me up.
Are you asking about how to watch IEM in korean?

> [{quoted}](name=Vixanys,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=qr45EuiX,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-03-12T13:50:23.659+0000)
>
> Are you asking about how to watch IEM in korean?

No. Of course NOT. I live in Indiana & I want to watch League @ IEM & I just don't understand the confusing website.
HOW Do I actually watch the League matches? 0700 & I was up and everything to catch the match but I cant fig it out.

IEM Katowice for LoL Schedule:
Friday – March 13th

13:00 to 14:00 CET - Group A - Cloud9 vs GE Tigers (BO1)
14:10 to 15:10 CET - Group A - SK Gaming vs yoe Flash Wolves (BO1)
15:20 to 16:20 CET - Group A - Winners Match (BO1)
16:30 to 17:30 CET - Group A - Elimination Match (BO1)
17:40 to 18:40 CET - Group B - Gambit Gaming vs CJ Entus (BO1)
18:50 to 19:50 CET - Group B - Team SoloMid vs Team WE (BO1)
20:00 to 21:00 CET - Group B - Winners' Match (BO1)
21:10 to 22:10 CET - Group B - Elimination Match (BO1)
Saturday – March 14th

13:00 to 14:00 CET Group A - Decider Match (BO1)
14:10 to 15:10 CET Group B - Decider Match (BO1)
15:30 to 18:30 CET - Semifinal #1 (BO3)
18:45 to 21:45 CET - Semifinal #2 (BO3)
Sunday – March 15th

18:00 to 22:30 CET - Final (BO5)

Central European Time is 5 hours ahead of Eastern Time just so you know (That's 8am EST Friday and Saturday then 1PM Sunday)

you can watch on Lol Esports
